title: Raspberry and rhubarb drizzle cake with custard
description: This gluten-free cake uses polenta and ground nuts instead of flour which makes it very moist, especially with all the yummy fruit and syrup. For this recipe you will need a large round spiral-patterned bundt tin and cake release spray OR a 12x8in/30x20cm traybake tin, a food processor and a piping bag fitted with a small plain nozzle.
ingredients: 2 limes, juice and zest only (zest reserved for the sponge)
150g/5½oz rhubarb, trimmed and cut into small chunks
100g/3½oz shelled pistachios, ground to a powder using a food processor
150g/5½oz rhubarb, trimmed and cut into small chunks
1 bunch fresh mint, leaves picked and chopped
